mapper.insert: insert into ATCHFILEDT (ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_CN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME, FILE_FANCYSIZE, FILE_DWNCNT) values (#{atchFileId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileStreCours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orignlFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileExtsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileMime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFancysize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileDwncnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_CN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME, FILE_FANCYSIZE, FILE_DWNCNT from ATCHFILEDT
